company_info.Company Description: About The Company-Antilog Vacations is India’s leading online travel company Offering services to more than 33 countries across the globe and serving customers from 78+ countries, it has emerged as a pioneer in the travel industry that offers vast array of travel products and services to the traveller with Highest Certified Customer Satisfaction ratings of 89 % among the Indian Companies.It is currently recorded as one of the fastest growing online travel company in India. It is an IATA CERTIFIED company.
company_info.Company Name: Antilog Vacations (A unit of Techzis Technologies)
